metadata.title: CVE-2022-37426 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Unrestricted Upload of File with Dangerous Type vulnerability in OpenNebulaOpenNebula core on Linux allows File Content Injection.

criterions.comment: opennebula: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
